Using Dt-Toolbox in a browser

Dt-Toolbox is available as 'dtbox' global variable. Open source code and read it.

Example

Here is the sample data structure:

     const user = [{
                    profile: {
                            name: 'Peter'
                          , age : 43
                    }
              }]

Simplify data and render a template with it.

        dtbox
            .init ( user )
            .select ()
            .all()
            .spread ( 'dt', dt => result = dt.assemble().build()   )

        hookNode.innerHTML = `${result.name} is ${result.age} years old.`
